page.title: 16EDUCATION
page.content:
Up until this year, there have been only{3}schools in Towcester: Towcester Infants, Towcester Junior and Sponne secondary school. This year there are plans to open a new primary school in order to cope with the increased number of children who live in the area.
{TOWCESTER INFANT SCHOOL They take 4-7 year olds and they have 9 teaching staff at present. {TOWCESTER JUNIOR SCHOOL This is right next to the infant school and takes the children at present from 7-11. There are about 360 pupils in the school, although this will change when the new school is built. {SPONNE SECONDARY SCHOOL} Children aged 11-18 attend this school, built around the old grammar school.
